This is the blog of the `repliMAT` project - a resource for reproducible research in MATLAB.

You can find the main `repliMAT` project at [reproducibleMATLAB.github.io](https://reproducibleMATLAB.github.io).

On this blog you'll find posts relating to the concept of research reproducibility in MATLAB.

The blog is developed using the excellent [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) project.
